mapper.sql: review_no as reviewNo, RPAD(mem_id,9,'*') as memId, r.goods_no as goodsNo, r.content as content, score as score, DATE_FORMAT(r.regiDate,'%Y%m%d') as regiDateStr, DATE_FORMAT(r.updateDate,'%Y%m%d') as updateDateStr, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY r.regidate desc) AS rownum, count(1) over() AS totalCount
